Documentation

Sales Dashboard¶

The Sales analytics page displays visualizations of the following data: Top 5 Sales – the top 5 best selling Menu items in a bar graph ($) and piechart (%) Top 5 Customers – the top 5 customers in a bar graph (5) and piechart (%)
